interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Song of Phoenix
Review Date: 2019/07/18
Product Description: ['Qu Yuan, a Chinese poet and minister who is born into a good family during the Warring States Era, falls in love with a slave, Mo Chou Nu. However, their relationship is extremely prohibited due to their different status and identity. To get together, they not only face numerous obstacles but also get entangled in palace politics.  And Qu Yuan is planning to save his county due to his patriotism.']
Average Rating: 4.1

reference_summary:
America: Imagine a World without Her
John Sullivan  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles
["The new film from the creators of 2016: OBAMA'S AMERICA takes America's critics at face value and imagines a world in which she never existed. Today that notion of the essential goodness of America is under attack, replaced by another story in which theft and plunder are seen as the defining features of American history--from the theft of Native American and Mexican lands and the exploitation of African labor to a contemporary foreign policy said to be based on stealing oil and a capitalist system that robs people of their 'fair share.' Gerald Molen, the Academy Award-winning producer of SCHINDLER'S LIST, Dinesh D'Souza, the New York Times best-selling author and creator of 2016, and director John Sullivan invite you on a journey of discovery that will bring you face-to-face with America's most compelling contemporary critics along with the heroes who built America, in the times in which they lived, bled, and sacrificed in order to build a great nation. You'll be there as Christopher C"]

Noah Ringer  (Actor),     Nicola Peltz  (Actor),     M. Night Shyamalan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['Experience the thrilling live-action adventure based on the hit Nickelodeon series', 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', '. Join Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible “bending” powers, as he journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends. As the Avatar, he is the only one who can end the age-old conflict between the four nations: Air, Water, Earth and Fire. An inspirational journey,', 'The Last Airbender', 'is exciting entertainment for the entire family!']

Addicting storyline.  Great adaptation from the TV series.  Hard to take an entire season and condense it into 2 hours.  They hit all the high points and we are looking forward to the rest of the trilogy and hope it is produced.  Amazing scenery.  Great acting. That ice castle...I mean WOW.  The special effects are incredible.  Highly recommend.
Great Movie....My family loved it.

An awesome collection.  My children have most of these in a hodge podge of places.  This set has them all in one place and a few selection we did not have.  Beautiful.  Nice addition to our Studio Ghibli collection..
WOW!
Cowboy Bebop: The Movie [Special Edition]
Steve Blum  (Actor),     Beau Billingslea  (Actor),     Shinichiro Watanabe  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime
['Mars. Days before Halloween 2071. Villains blow up a tanker truck on Highway One, releasing a deadly virus that kills hundreds. Fearing a bigger, even more devastating biochemical attack, an astronomical reward is offered for the arrest and capture of the person behind the destruction. On the spaceship "Bebop," Spike Spiegel and his crew of bounty hunters (Jet Black, Faye Valentine, Ed and Ein) are bored and short of cash. But with the news of the reward everything changes. Based on the wildly popular TV series, Cowboy Bebop, the big-screen smash COWBOY BEBOP: THE MOVIE pits Spike and Co. against their deadliest adversary ever. Featuring stunning, state-of-the-art animation, this action-packed sci-fi adventure builds to a breath-taking, nail-biting climax, guaranteed to keep you hanging on the edge of your seat.']

If you are into the BeBop series...this is a great movie.  I had not watched the series, but my teens liked it.  I watched the movie and enjoyed it without having the background.  Nice story line.
this is a great movie. I had not watched the series

Check out "Love 020" on NETFLIX TOO.  Really addicting.  iT CANNOT compare to the extended version..but shared with my daughter...she is now watching the extended version.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Consumption Preferences:** Enthusiastic about thought-provoking documentaries and films that challenge mainstream narratives, particularly around American history and identity. Enjoys family-friendly adventure films and curated animated collections for enhanced family viewing experiences. The user has recently shown a strong interest in compelling international stories, particularly from China, and continues to embrace anime with rich storytelling and ongoing character adventures.

- **Values:** Appreciates patriotic themes that highlight American virtues while valuing universally loved animated films with moral and imaginative depth. The user embraces diverse storytelling that resonates culturally, reflecting a growing interest in international narratives.

- **Review Behavior:** Generally provides high ratings, often 5.0, for content aligning with personal values, though has recently rated a series lower due to accessibility issues despite a compelling plot. This indicates a focus on the overall viewing experience and a desire for seamless engagement. 

- **Engagement Style:** Displays enthusiasm through positive, detailed reviews that spotlight storytelling, visuals, and overall presentation but is also willing to provide constructive feedback, especially concerning access and flow of content.

- **Interest in Historical Contexts:** Maintains a passion for historical themes, focusing on redefining American history while celebrating adventure and family values.

Overall, the user is deeply engaged with content that aligns with patriotic viewpoints, emphasizes positivity, showcases strong narratives across various genres, and shows a commitment to thoughtful feedback, especially regarding accessibility in international storytelling.
